component.name: listViews
component.description: Returns the list of list views for the specified sObject, including the ID and other basic information about each list view

component.name: listViewById
component.description: Get basic information for a specific list view by ID

component.name: recentListViews
component.description: Returns the list of recently used list views for the given sObject type

component.name: describeListViewById
component.description: Returns detailed information about a list view, including the ID, the columns, and the SOQL query.

component.name: listViewResults
component.description: Executes the SOQL query for the list view and returns the resulting data and presentation information.
